title: Sculptor's Model Head of a Lion
description:
Large plaster cast of a lion's head.
The cast appears ancient and is an average specimen of the work of the Ptolemaic Period. The right ear appears to have been re-worked after the casting was completed.
Condition: Left ear missing, surface somewhat discolored, otherwise good.
dimensions:
6 15/16 x 5 13/16 x 4 1/2 in. (17.7 x 14.8 x 11.5 cm)
mount (display and handling backing made 2015): 8 1/4 x 7 1/2 in. (21 x 19.1 cm)
